divs: Sighting Details1.in the front yard looking at far things at my street and in the sky with my binocular. 2.it was shaped like a disc 3.i thought it was a plane 4.it was a ovale disc shaped object and it was just floating in 1 spot for about 3 to 4 mins. it was not making any sound or movement. 5.at first i wasint really sher it was a ufo because i was just looking in the sky without my binocuular then i got my binocular and found te object and said "that is a ufo". when i went to school i start telling my friends that i saw a ufo but they didint believe me because they dont believe in ufo's,and they start saying "its a plane" but i told them its not a plane ita a ufo and then they strt laughing at me and saying jokes. 6.after i found the object i went into a house to try to get a camera to film it and put it on the ufo websites but i didint find one.when i came back outside it wasint ther.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Windsor
There were no other sightings in Windsor on or around June 19th 2008
Summary: ufo disc was just in the air and wasint moving
